name: Chaos Element
description:
This is our Second ludum Dare and even Game publish.

 We hope you will like the game :)

What upgrade we have in mind  :

- Custom grid  

- new kind of piece and behaviors

- new interaction 

- add animation (grid creation , piece death … ect)

P.S, we are really grateful for the feedback. We know that the game is FAR from perfect, but we want to make more, so thank you !
